data.title: Xscape, SWV, Mya, 702 & Total Tickets
data.meta_description: Xscape, SWV, Mya, 702 & Total on 10 August 2024 at Blossom Music Center in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio. Tickets available. Click here to find out more.
data.text:
This groundbreaking line-up brings together the best of the best! Xscape, SWV, Mya, 702, and Total are currently regarded as some of the most exhilarating performers of R&B, and for this reason, they’re taking on the most noteworthy summer outing! The Queens of R&B brings the most iconic songstresses who sang about independence, overcoming hardships, love, and more. The spectacle, which is slated to light up 30 major venues across the U.S., has been deemed a celebration of power, passion, and resilience. Every bit of this statement is exactly what these queens are all about. After conquering the ‘90s and 2000s with magnificent hits, they are back to entertain music lovers.

The show features headliners Xscape and SWV (Sisters With Voices). Both prolific acts were enigmas during their prime. And they dominated the scene with unprecedented R&B staples that conquered both MTV and radio waves. Xscape found incredible commercial success with titles like “My Little Secret,” “Who Can I Run To,” “Just Kickin’ It,” and more. The trio, comprising Kandi Burrus, Tameka Cottle, and Tamika Scott, made their highly anticipated reunion in 2017, and they have been lighting up the live music circuit ever since.

Meanwhile, the world became addicted to the smashing hits of SWV. These ladies belted out excellent titles, such as “I’m So Into You,” “Weak,” “Right Here/ Human Nature,” “You’re the One,” and many more. SWV released a total of five albums, including their later releases, I Missed Us and Still. The trio sold over 25 million albums worldwide, making them one of the best-selling female R&B groups of all time.

Aside from remarkable performances from Xscape and SWV, the Queens of R&B also features outstanding sets from esteemed soloist Mya, who was basically it girl of the 90s and 2000s. She dropped several iconic Billboard Hot 100 hits like “It’s All About Me,” “Take Me There,” “Case of the Ex,” and “Lady Marmalade.” Mya continued releasing new music, with her latest single, “Anytime,” released in 2024.

See Mya, along with beloved girl groups 702 and Total, as they hype up the crowd for Xscape and SWV.

Witness these queens provide top-tier entertainment as they light up the Blossom Music Center with outstanding music! Hurry and secure your passes now before you miss out!
